decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawing numbers: EX-A0.01 (Existing Site Plan); EX-A1.01 (Existing Basement Plan); EX-A1.02 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); EX-A1.03 (Existing First Floor Plan); EX-A1.04 (Existing Second Floor Plan); EX-A1.05 (Existing Roof Plan); EX-A2.01 (Existing Elevations); EX-A3.01 (Existing Sections); PR-A0.01 (Proposed Site Plan); PR-A1.01 (Proposed Basement Plan); PR-A1.02 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); PR-A1.03 (Proposed First Floor Plan); PR-A1.04 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); PR-A1.05 (Proposed Roof Plan); PR-A3 (Proposed Elevations); PR-A4.01 (Proposed Sections).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall be in accordance with those described in the hereby approved drawings listed in Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021), the NPPF (2021) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The proposed side elevation windows hereby approved shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres (5'7") above the relevant floor level.
Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Rear roof extension to main and outrigger roof slopes
